original_text: And he said to those who stood by, ‘Take the mina from him, and give it to the one who has the ten minas.’
korean_text: 곁에 섰는 자들에게 이르되 그 한 므나를 빼앗아 열 므나 있는 자에게 주라 하니

sentences.original_text: And he said to those who stood by,
and give it to the one who has the ten minas.’
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 십 므나를 가진 자에게 주라.’
